snippet: Advertisements featuring the end of the world, exploding town squares and pouncing cheetahs made the columnist, at home for the Super Bowl, crave the melee of the arena.
abstract: Advertisements featuring the end of the world, exploding town squares and pouncing cheetahs made the columnist, at home for the Super Bowl, crave the melee of the arena.
lead_paragraph: Am I the only one creeped out by the Super Bowl commercials?

headline.main: A Violent Game. And That Was Just the Commercials.
